Note: Burden based on the first stanza of 2840.
Title(s): A Litany to Christ, the Virgin Mary, Angels and Saints
_description: A Litany to Christ, the Virgin Mary, Angels and Saints — nine 6-line stanzas (ababcc) with refrain, ‘And bryng us to that blysse / That neuere shall mysse’, and 4-line burden: ‘Prey we to the trinyte / And to al the holy compane / For to bryng vs to the blys / The wych shal neuer mysse’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Ihesus for þi holy name& for þi beter
                    passyon…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…That we may cum to þat blysseþe wych neuer shall
                    mysse
